link.desc: Don't link to too many Windows-related things, but this is a nice way of making the Windows 11 Taskbar into a minimal dock.

link.title: no hello
link.desc: A colleague has been plagued with these recently and just so happens that this is doing the rounds again. Wish there was a non-aggressive way of sending this as a response to people who do it

photo.alt: A crowd of people gathered around a singer with a microphone on a London street. Some are cheering, some are holding their mobile phones.

link.title: In Pictures: Notting Hill Carnival 2023
link.desc: Londonist's photo rundown of this year's Notting Hill Carnival. Haven't been in many years but it's a great time! Music and atmosphere is like nothing else.
